website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive and stylish surfboard bag that will shield your board’s nose and ensure that your car’s seats aren’t covered with wax when you’re headed to the beach.
pros: Available in a wide range of sizes
Stretchy material fits longboards, shortboards, and hybrids
Protects against UV rays, bumps, and scratches
cons: All surfboard travel bag sizes may not be in stock online

customer_reviews.title: Nose design, not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7'6" fun board with a rounded nose, and the design of the nose of the bag on the website (rounded nose) was not what I received. I received a bag where the nose was more pointy and doesn't fit well. The website shows a nose/bag that was more rounded to fit my fun board. You'll see the two pictures below. The one is of the bag I received with the more pointy nose, and the second picture is what they show me on their website. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: bwill

customer_reviews.title: The hybrid 6.0 was a perfect fit for my board.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect for my 5'8 quad and getting the hybrid 6.0 cover was what I needed for the nose which my board, which is not as sharp as the shortboard cover. I love the hidden velcro pouch, for keys, tucked away inside. I will say, the fins on my board are a bit sharp (for performance) and one of the fins cut through the material just sitting in the car. I would suggest some thicker material (like the nose) to line inside where the fins are.
customer_reviews.author: David Nadas

customer_reviews.title: Nice design + Quality, But....
customer_reviews.text: Nice fabric, design, quality. Better nose piece then other socks. I bought a 6’0” for a 6’1” shortboard, and pienty of coverage at the bottom. My complaint, hence the 3 stars, is its too loose of a fit. I like my Julie Designs because it’s a nice snug perfect fit. This one is a baggy fit and if I keep it, it’s going to the tailors. (My board is a hybrid board and not a skinny pro board) Especially extra loose around the nose. POOR Cut/Fit. If they tailored up the fit to be more like the JD's, this would be a for sure winner.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Thinner that I expected
customer_reviews.text: Compared to similar product from "Channel Island" this product looks cheap - very thin. Also it hardly fits a softboard size 7". But it's OK, it's just a simple product, no high expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent board sock.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent surfboard sock. I bought the 6'8" for my 6'3" hybrid Lost RV, which is wider than most boards. The sock fits perfectly and is not too tight so it is easy to slip off and slip back on. Great product for board protection in my SUV as well as to prevent wax smudges to the interior. Such a good product, I will be getting another one for my new board.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry K

customer_reviews.title: Improper description
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this protective sleeve/sock for my new Stand up paddleboard which is 10’2”, the item description states that the sock will cover up to 10’6”, which would allow a buffer of at least 4”, to which the cover doesn’t provide.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Not as Described - does not fit boards 10'6"
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 10'6" paddle board. Came up short by about 8". sent it back. These are way shorter then described. I would size up for everything.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: A bit too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: This sock fits well but is a little too stretchy and makes it hard to carry. I like it but the material could be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle N.

customer_reviews.title: My opinion on the cover
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion it is not good for travel because if the surfboard falls or gets hit then it is not really protective because it is really thin and it is better to buy already a surfboard travel bag because it is also not really strong for example to me it is torn but with you just need a cover not for travel so it is ok Relative to price but if you want to travel and are willing to spend another drop of money, it is better to cover travel
customer_reviews.author: Nadav

customer_reviews.title: Surfer Queen Board Cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my Granddaughters Birthday and she loved it. Looks great and fits well. She is out little surfer Queen.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Farwig

customer_reviews.title: Not made for SUP boards
customer_reviews.text: Have a 10' paddle board. Order the 10'6 sock. Missing about 3'to cover the board. Like the idea. Stretchy material is nice but barely fit around my board. Going to have to return, bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT 6'10" AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: My board is a 6'8", and this is a 6'10" sock cover. You think it would fit right? WRONG. It didn't even fully cover my 6'8"... this sock is for a 6'6"... if that. Other than that, this boardbag does not have reinforcements for fin holes that can wear over time, and the drawstring feels flimsy. Do yourself a favor and pay a couple extra bucks for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sock
customer_reviews.text: Good board sock. Super cheap price. Has that “fresh from a Chinese factory” petroleum product smell when it comes out of the bag but it disipates in a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fasulo

customer_reviews.title: Left sun stripes on my board over time.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on but the strips left sun strips on my board. Ruined the design on my new board. Not stoked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these so far. Fits great even though my board is much wider and thicker than the usual short board. My board is 6' and I ordered the 6' bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large cover for my 8' 4" board fits perfectly. Excellent product for a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered the 8'2 and 9'6 well made . received it fast , color looks nicer in person.

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 9 foot surf board and this item fix perfectly on my surf board.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value, just as nice as an FCS one that I've had a while and this was much cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Great Surf Sock
customer_reviews.text: This is a great surf sock and is flexible to various types and shapes of surfboards and love the blue color!

customer_reviews.title: Great surfboard sock
customer_reviews.text: Great sock for light board protection...and not getting wax/sand all over my car. Boyfriend very pleased with gift.

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 9' board just fine, but I would probably get one a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 9' board just fine, but I would probably get one a little longer next time. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: quality board sock
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, pretty thick material, a lot of stretch over the board. I got the 6'8" hybrid cover for a 6'5" round nose fish and although the tip is not a perfect fit it is good enough and the sizing works great.
customer_reviews.author: Dbe

customer_reviews.title: Great value great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great cover very good value for the money I use it with a 5'6 softboard. It protects the board for day trips and allows me to wrap a bungee around it without leaving makrks on the board would highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 10' bag for a 9'6" longboard and it fits great! My only critique is that this type of cover can be tedious with a longboard. It is a lot of board to put a sock over and makes it kind of awkward to put on and take off.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fit my fish 5’10” x 20” perfect, very nice material and color

customer_reviews.title: Good longboard sock for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this order bc of the reviews, but I ordered the 9’ sock for a 9’4” longboard and it fits like a glove. No more wax rubbing on the truck and boat.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and great quanlity
customer_reviews.text: Webought our first Pamgea sock cover, a 9'0" Pamgea sock cover for my son's new Estrada 9'2" long board. Fits perfect and we will be getting more covers for his other boards.

customer_reviews.title: Durable surf sock
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my 7’4” board with a couple extra inches of room to spare which is exactly what I was looking for. Quality product, I can tell this will withstand years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: too baggy
customer_reviews.text: The item description did not state it was for a wider type board. It is too baggy for my standard short board 6-0x19x2 3/8.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. Thicker than I expected, and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: RrB

customer_reviews.title: Packaging could improve
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was not great as there was small tear in the fabric ...other than that I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Right Sider

customer_reviews.title: stretchy and good price
customer_reviews.text: so far, this has been a good deal! Not only is the price right, it is super stretchy and you don't have to wrestle and break a sweat trying to get it on your board
customer_reviews.author: Jane Preston

customer_reviews.title: V E R Y  H A P P Y
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, soft material and fits perfect my board.(5' 5" TOMO LFT)
customer_reviews.author: J O H N

customer_reviews.title: Works & looks perfect. I tried putting it on my 5'10 board ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the cover 2 days prior to a weekend surf trip - the cover arrived Friday morning & I was pleasantly surprised with the quality. I ordered the 6'4 cover to fit my 6'2 board & have some room to work with. Works & looks perfect. I tried putting it on my 5'10 board too & the drawstring etc. works perfect. My advice would be to go an extra 2 inches past your board length just to be safe. Overall, solid cover with a nice bottom drawstring & a sleek look/color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This board sock doesn't fit as stated!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sock for my 10'6" paddle board and it doesn't fit. I purchased the size they suggested and they must have their measurements wrong. I would not buy from them again!! I'm giving one star as it did arrive on time.
customer_reviews.author: BNick

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ride a 8'6" and the 9 foot one fits great even with the fins on. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 9ft beginner long board
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for 9ft beginner long board...extra wide foam board. Just returned from week at beach, having strapped the board to roof of van for several hundred miles each way plus daily trips to beach, and cover shows no sign of wear. Would consider this to be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lani

customer_reviews.title: This board bag is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This board bag is super easy to use. It has a perfect amount of stretch to fit any longboard, but doesn't have a lot of extra material. Great design, and hasn't faded after being out in direct sun for months.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I got the 9 foot model to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got the 9 foot model to fit over my 8 foot foam surf board. I think I could have gone with the 8 foot model. Either way it works well to keep sand out of my car as I transport my board in my car.
customer_reviews.author: David Jones

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Definitely happy with my purchase. I have a 9' 6" single fin and it fits it perfectly. The drawstring is a nice touch to close it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Cady

customer_reviews.title: Quality board sock
customer_reviews.text: Great board sock, its durable, and fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It even includes a little velcro patch where you can put your wax.

customer_reviews.title: perfection
customer_reviews.text: used for my 6'10" mini longboard. absolute perfection. will order again.

customer_reviews.title: Thick  cushiony fabric
customer_reviews.text: For Dry docking my long board and a sleeping bag if I decide to stay on the beach

customer_reviews.title: works great! really nice stretchy towel fabric

customer_reviews.title: PAMGEA SURFBOARD SOCK
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed by the quality of this 6’ sleeve! It’s fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for all of our surfboards
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for all of our surfboards. They all fit well. The material is soft and cozy but not cheap feeling. Excellent choice

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cover longboard. Husband was worried i spent too much, but he thought it was good price for material (terry cloth/loom)

customer_reviews.title: Aloha
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Looks good in bag. Waiting to pick up repaired boards in Hilo before use. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: BOARD BAG
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for an 8' board, should have bought 7', much longer than expected, but good quality, just too long.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my mini tanker
customer_reviews.text: Looks narrow but it's stretchy so my 23 inch wide board slipped right in!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome board cover.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made fabric. Thick weave. Exactly what was advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's durable and cool looking. The padded nose is really great too... ideal for travelling. Will be ordering more for my other boards.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover! It's cute and practical. It keeps my board safe and my car clean.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: PAMGEA Surfboard Sock Cover (Aqua) - Lightweight Board Bag (Shortboard, Longboard, and Hybrid)
feature_bullets: Lightweight protection for your surfboard! Sock styled bag for protecting your surfboard to and from the beach.

Sizing and Shape: we recommend a size right around the length of your surfboard. If your board it on the thinner side, and not very wide, we recommend a slightly smaller size. If it is a thicker style board, we recommend buying the exact size or couple inches longer. If you have a question about sizing, Please feel free to ask us!
Padded nose with stretch fabric to protect your surfboard from bumps, scratches, and UV rays. Great for local trips to the beach, as well as extra protection inside travel bags!
Prevents wax from rubbing on your car's interior. We chose lightly colored material to help prevent your board from getting too hot.
Please note: Pamgea Surfboard Sock Covers are sized to fit Surfboards. Stand Up Paddleboards are often much wider and thicker than surfboards, and will not fit properly.
